nodes.text: The Tandell system was the home system to the planet of Wor Tandell. It was located in the Dolomar sector.

Rebel agent Tay Vanis had inserted himself as an aide to Imperial Governor Lord Cuvir in the governor's mansion on the planet of Wor Tandell, where he was collecting data on Imperial fleet movements in the Tandell system sometime early in the Galactic Civil War.
